name: Crybaby
description:
You're a dad trying to survive the apocalypse with your baby, who doesn't stop crying because he's craving donuts.

Mouse to shoot.

Press E to drop the baby and shoot.

ESC to exit.

Credits:

Game Direction: Unlost Pixel

Art and Animations: Unlost Pixel, Sucurí

Coding: XinW (Discord: XinW#4692), Bren (Discord: Bren007pie#5092)

Audio Design: Abieo (Discord: abieo#1413)
